a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Share of population with alcohol use disorder vs. drug use disorder, 2019
Share of the population with an alcohol use disorder versus the share with drug use disorder (which does not include alcohol or tobacco
smoking). Drug use disorders include opioids, cocaine, amphetamine and cannabis.
Share of population with drug use disorder
Share of population with alcohol use disorder
Data source: IHME, Global Burden of Disease (2019)
Note: To allow comparisons between countries and over time this metric is age-standardized.
